item.title: Making a Website with Hugo
item.description: How I Made This Website Everyone Should Have a Website Everyone should have their own website. In the early days of the of the internet, a much higher percentage of internet users had their own webpage. As the internet opened up to less tech-savvy people, social media websites became the places where people would share their thoughts. This is for good reason, humans are social animals and social media allowed for much greater interaction and social networking than personal webpages.
